scripts.compile: echo "┏━━ Compiling API" && run lint && run cleardist && run tsc && run clearmodules && run re-yarn && echo "┗━━ Done"
scripts.lint:
echo "┣┳━ Running Lint
┃┠─ run lint {options}" && eslint src --max-warnings 2 --color --cache && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.cleardist:
echo "┣┳━ Running ClearDist
┃┠─ run rimraf dist" && rimraf dist && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.tsc:
echo "┣┳━ Running Typescript Compiler
┃┠─ run tsc --build" && tsc --build && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.clearmodules:
echo "┣┳━ Running ClearModules
┃┠─ run rimraf ../../node_modules/@jackatdjl/athenetz-sv-api" && rimraf ../../node_modules/@jackatdjl/athenetz-sv-api && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.re-yarn:
echo "┣┳━ Running Re-Yarn
┃┠─ run yarn" && yarn && echo "┃┠─ run yarn dedupe" && yarn dedupe && echo "┃┗━ Done"
